Articles.Content:
Hi guys,

I am having problem with antenna extension. After transmitting science data my antenna retracted and there is no longer option to extend it again after I right click on it. Can you help? I would like antenna to be extended for visual and immersion purposes after I've build such a nice looking probe

Thnx

Nothing new about this. A few versions back there was a brief period antennae could be opened and closed at will. But not any more.

What you could do is setting an action group to toggle them. This will work no matter if they've been used for science or not.
